ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I’m a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Cologne. My passion lies in creating digital experiences that seamlessly blend aesthetics and usability. Whether it’s a sleek website or a complex application, I’m driven by the challenge of turning ideas into interactive and engaging solutions.
ABOUT.BULLET_1: I pride myself on being adaptable—whether working remotely or on-site, I’m committed to delivering high-quality results. I’m also open to relocating to my employer’s city, ensuring a collaborative and productive work environment.
ABOUT.BULLET_2: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.BULLET_3: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code, it's a creative form of problem-solving. I enjoy simplifying complex technical challenges and designing solutions that put users first. Each project is an opportunity to learn, improve, and contribute to something impactful.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_2: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
CONTACT.ERROR_NAME: Your name is required and must only contain letters.
CONTACT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Please enter a message (at least 4 characters).
CONTACT.POLICY_AGREE: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your message has been successfully sent.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.NAME: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

POLLO_LOCO.NAME: El Pollo Loco
POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe' to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

POKEDEX.NAME: Pokedex
POKEDEX.DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

SKILLS.TITLE: My skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

FIRST.TEXT: Eduard was always dependable and kept the team on track. His ability to focus on the bigger picture while still handling the details helped us make steady progress. He also brought a great sense of humor to the group, which made working together much more enjoyable.
FIRST.NAME: J. Lohmann - Team Partner

SECOND.TEXT: Eduard made teamwork easy. He communicated clearly, stayed reliable throughout, and always had a positive attitude.
SECOND.NAME: T. Becker - Team Partner

THIRD.TEXT: Working with Eduard was a genuinely good experience. He kept everyone motivated and made sure we stayed on course without losing sight of the team’s dynamic. His approachable nature made him a great teammate.
THIRD.NAME: N. Gruber

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.GENERAL_DESC: This privacy policy informs you about the type, scope, and purpose of the processing of personal data within our online offer. This privacy policy applies from 01.01.2025.
PRIVACY_POLICY.AFFECTED_PERSONS_DESC: Visitors and users of the online offer (Hereinafter, we refer to the affected persons collectively as 'users').
PRIVACY_POLICY.PURPOSE_PROVIDE: Provision of the online offer, its contents, and functions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PURPOSE_CONTACT: Answering contact inquiries and communication with users.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACTING_DESC: When contacting us via email, your details will be processed for the purpose of handling the contact request. We do not share this information without your consent.
PRIVACY_POLICY.YOUR_RIGHTS_DESC: You can exercise the following rights at any time using the contact details provided:
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_INFO: Information about your data stored by us and their processing.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_DELETION: Deletion of your data stored by us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_RESTRICTION: Restriction of data processing if we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_OBJECTION: Objection to the processing of your data by us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_PORTABILITY: Data portability if you have consented to the data processing or have concluded a contract with us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_WITHDRAWAL: If you have given us consent, you can withdraw this at any time with effect for the future.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_COMPLAINT: You can always file a complaint with the supervisory authority.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CHANGES_DESC: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy to ensure it complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services.
